title: NBC SAYS COLOMBO’S MALCOLM RANJITH IS ONE OF 20 PROBABLY TO BECOME THE NEXT POPE
content: – By Walter Jayawardhana – America’s NBC news service listed Cardinal Malcom Ranjith of Colombo as one of twenty most possible candidates to become the next Pope as thousands converged at St.Peter;s Square for the chance to join Roman Catholic cardinals for a special pre-conclave mass….
